title: nindalu mOpuvAru
sahitya:
nindalu mOpuvAru kAvale


anupallavi

  pandulu lEka kamana sandulu bAgaunA


caraNam 1    manamu cEyu pApa pankilamunu tanivi tIra bhujiyincE vAru
    caraNam 2    duSTulu lEka shiSTajanulaku utkrSTata kaligE nA epuDaina 
drSTi dOSa hara purandara viTThalA iSTa phalada muraLIdharA
